IssueDescription: Washing machine makes loud noise during spin cycle; possible imbalance.
Air conditioner does not cool properly; airflow is weak even at maximum fan.
Vacuum cleaner loses suction after a few minutes; filter indicator stays on.
Microwave heats unevenly; plate stays cold while edges are hot.
Blender stops intermittently under load; burning smell noticed.
Phone battery drains quickly; device gets warm during normal use.
Air purifier shows error code E3; unit shuts off after 10 minutes.
Heater turns off randomly; thermostat does not keep temperature stable.
Dryer does not dry fully; clothes come out damp after full cycle.
Cooktop ignition clicks continuously; one burner does not ignite.
Hair dryer overheats and shuts down; power button feels loose.
Toaster heats only one side; bread burns on the left slot.
Washing machine displays error code; water not draining after rinse.
Air conditioner makes rattling sound; outdoor unit vibration is high.
Vacuum cleaner battery does not charge to 100%; stops at around 60%.
Washing machine door does not lock; cycle cannot start.
Air conditioner remote not responding; unit only works with manual button.
Vacuum cleaner brush head not spinning; debris remains on carpet.
Microwave keypad is unresponsive; some buttons do not register.
Blender jar leaks from the bottom seal; liquid spills during use.
Phone screen shows flickering at low brightness; occasional ghost touches.
Air purifier produces unusual noise; fan seems unbalanced.
Heater fan runs but no warm air; heating element may be faulty.
Dryer drum does not rotate; motor hums but drum stays still.
Cooktop glass has cracked near the corner; request safety inspection.
Hair dryer makes sparks at plug; request cable replacement.
Toaster lever does not stay down; toast pops up immediately.
Washing machine has water leakage from under the unit after wash cycle.
Air conditioner smells musty when starting; possible mold in filters.
Vacuum cleaner makes high-pitched noise; suspected air path blockage.
